pp2.4:21.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhāno?
pp2.4:21.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañhaṁ puṭṭho samāno yuttaṁ vadati no sīghaṁ—
pp2.4:22.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo muttappaṭibhāno no yuttappaṭibhāno?
pp2.4:22.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañhaṁ puṭṭho samāno sīghaṁ vadati no yuttaṁ—
pp2.4:23.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo yuttappaṭibhāno ca muttappaṭibhāno ca?
pp2.4:23.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañhaṁ puṭṭho samāno yuttañca vadati sīghañca—
pp2.4:23.3_0: ayaṁ vuccati puggalo “yuttappaṭibhāno ca muttappaṭibhāno ca”.
pp2.4:24.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo neva yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhāno?

pp2.4:24.3_0: ayaṁ vuccati, puggalo “neva yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhāno”.

pp2.4:84.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī no puññaphalūpajīvī?

pp2.4:102.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo ārohaṁ vā passitvā pariṇāhaṁ vā passitvā saṇṭhānaṁ vā passitvā pāripūriṁ vā passitvā tattha pamāṇaṁ gahetvā pasādaṁ janeti.
pp2.4:103.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo paravaṇṇanāya parathomanāya parapasaṁsanāya paravaṇṇahārikāya tattha pamāṇaṁ gahetvā pasādaṁ janeti.
pp2.4:104.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo cīvaralūkhaṁ vā passitvā pattalūkhaṁ vā passitvā senāsanalūkhaṁ vā passitvā vividhaṁ
pp2.4:104.2_1: vā dukkarakārikaṁ passitvā tattha pamāṇaṁ gahetvā pasādaṁ janeti.
pp2.4:105.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo sīlaṁ vā passitvā samādhiṁ vā passitvā paññaṁ vā passitvā tattha pamāṇaṁ gahetvā pasādaṁ janeti.
pp2.4:106.1_0: Kathañca puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya?
pp2.4:106.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
pp2.4:106.3_0: attanā samādhisampanno hoti, no paraṁ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
pp2.4:106.4_0: attanā paññāsampanno hoti, no paraṁ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
pp2.4:106.5_0: attanā vimuttisampanno hoti, no paraṁ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
pp2.4:106.6_0: attanā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, no paraṁ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
pp2.4:106.7_0: Evaṁ puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya.
pp2.4:107.1_0: Kathañca puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti no attahitāya?

pp2.4:107.7_0: Evaṁ puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti no attahitāya.

pp2.4:108.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
pp2.4:108.3_0: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, parañca samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
pp2.4:108.4_0: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, parañca paññāsampadāya samādapeti;

pp2.4:108.7_0: Evaṁ puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca.
pp2.4:109.1_0: Kathañca puggalo neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya?

pp2.4:109.3_0: attanā na samādhisampanno hoti, no paraṁ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;

pp2.4:109.7_0: Evaṁ puggalo neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya.
pp2.4:110.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo acelako hoti muttācāro hatthāpalekhano,
pp2.4:110.2_1: naehibhaddantiko natiṭṭhabhaddantiko nābhihaṭaṁ na uddissakataṁ na nimantanaṁ sādiyati,
pp2.4:110.2_2: so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhāti na kaḷopimukhā paṭiggaṇhāti,
pp2.4:110.2_3: na eḷakamantaraṁ na daṇḍamantaraṁ na musalamantaraṁ na dvinnaṁ bhuñjamānānaṁ na gabbhiniyā na pāyamānāya na purisantaragatāya,
pp2.4:110.2_4: na saṅkittīsu na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti na yattha makkhikā saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī,
pp2.4:110.2_5: na macchaṁ na maṁsaṁ na suraṁ na merayaṁ na thusodakaṁ pivati.
pp2.4:110.3_0: So ekāgāriko vā hoti ekālopiko, dvāgāriko vā hoti dvālopiko …pe…
pp2.4:110.5_0: ekissāpi dattiyā yāpeti, dvīhipi dattīhi yāpeti …pe…
pp2.4:110.7_0: ekāhikampi āhāraṁ āhāreti, dvīhikampi āhāraṁ āhāreti …pe…
pp2.4:110.10_0: So sākabhakkho vā hoti sāmākabhakkho vā hoti nīvārabhakkho vā hoti daddulabhakkho vā hoti haṭabhakkho
pp2.4:110.10_1: vā hoti kaṇabhakkho vā hoti ācāmabhakkho vā hoti piññākabhakkho vā hoti tiṇabhakkho vā hoti gomayabhakkho vā hoti,
pp2.4:110.11_0: So sāṇānipi dhāreti masāṇānipi dhāreti chavadussānipi dhāreti paṁsukūlānipi dhāreti tirīṭānipi dhāreti
pp2.4:110.11_1: ajinampi dhāreti ajinakkhipampi dhāreti kusacīrampi dhāreti vākacīrampi dhāreti phalakacīrampi dhāreti
pp2.4:110.11_2: kesakambalampi dhāreti vāḷakambalampi dhāreti ulūkapakkhampi dhāreti,
pp2.4:110.12_0: Iti evarūpaṁ anekavihitaṁ kāyassa ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
pp2.4:111.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo orabbhiko hoti sūkariko sākuṇiko māgaviko luddo macchaghātako coro coraghātako goghātako bandhanāgāriko,
pp2.4:112.1_0: Kathañca puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto,
pp2.4:112.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo rājā vā hoti khattiyo muddhāvasitto brāhmaṇo vā mahāsālo.
pp2.4:112.3_0: So puratthimena nagarassa navaṁ sandhāgāraṁ kārāpetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kharājinaṁ nivāsetvā sappitelena
pp2.4:112.3_1: kāyaṁ abbhañjitvā migavisāṇena piṭṭhiṁ kaṇḍuvamāno sandhāgāraṁ pavisati saddhiṁ mahesiyā brāhmaṇena ca
pp2.4:112.4_0: So tattha anantarahitāya bhūmiyā haritupalittāya seyyaṁ kappeti.
pp2.4:112.5_0: Ekissā gāviyā sarūpavacchāya yaṁ ekasmiṁ thane khīraṁ hoti tena rājā yāpeti,
pp2.4:112.5_1: yaṁ dutiyasmiṁ thane khīraṁ hoti tena mahesī yāpeti,
pp2.4:112.5_2: yaṁ tatiyasmiṁ thane khīraṁ hoti tena brāhmaṇo purohito yāpeti,
pp2.4:112.5_3: yaṁ catutthasmiṁ thane khīraṁ hoti tena aggiṁ juhati,
pp2.4:112.7_5: ettakā assā haññantu yaññatthāya ettakā rukkhā chijjantu yūpatthāya,
pp2.4:112.8_0: Yepissa te honti dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā,
pp2.4:112.8_1: tepi daṇḍatajjitā bhayatajjitā assumukhā rudamānā parikammāni karonti.
pp2.4:112.9_0: Evaṁ puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto,
pp2.4:113.1_0: Kathañca puggalo neva attantapo ca hoti na attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto,
pp2.4:113.2_0: So anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṁvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati.
pp2.4:114.1_0: Idha tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
pp2.4:114.2_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
pp2.4:114.3_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
pp2.4:114.4_0: Taṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṁ vā kule paccājāto.
pp2.4:114.5_0: So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṁ paṭilabhati.
pp2.4:114.6_0: So tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati—
pp2.4:114.8_0: Nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
pp2.4:114.9_0: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan”ti.
pp2.4:114.10_0: So aparena samayena appaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya appaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ
pp2.4:114.10_1: pahāya mahantaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ
pp2.4:115.1_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti
pp2.4:115.1_1: nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
pp2.4:116.1_0: Adinnādānaṁ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī,
pp2.4:117.1_0: Abrahmacariyaṁ pahāya brahmacārī hoti ārācārī paṭivirato methunā gāmadhammā.
pp2.4:118.1_0: Musāvādaṁ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato hoti saccavādī saccasandho theto paccayiko avisaṁvādako lokassa.
pp2.4:119.1_0: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti,
pp2.4:119.1_1: ito sutvā na amutra akkhātā imesaṁ bhedāya,
pp2.4:119.1_2: amutra vā sutvā na imesaṁ akkhātā amūsaṁ bhedāya.
pp2.4:119.2_0: Iti bhinnānaṁ vā sandhātā sahitānaṁ vā anuppadātā samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandī samaggakaraṇiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.
pp2.4:120.1_0: Pharusaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti.
pp2.4:120.2_0: Yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā hoti.
pp2.4:121.1_1: kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī nidhānavatiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā kālena sāpadesaṁ pariyantavatiṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ.
pp2.4:124.1_0: So santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena.
pp2.4:124.2_0: So yena yeneva pakkamati samādāyeva pakkamati,
pp2.4:124.2_1: seyyathāpi nāma pakkhī sakuṇo yena yeneva ḍeti sapattabhārova ḍeti.
pp2.4:124.3_0: Evamevaṁ bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena.
pp2.4:124.4_0: So yena yeneva pakkamati samādāyeva pakkamati.
pp2.4:124.5_0: So iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ anavajjasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
pp2.4:125.1_0: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
pp2.4:125.2_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
pp2.4:125.7_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
pp2.4:125.8_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
pp2.4:125.9_0: So iminā ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ abyāsekasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
pp2.4:126.1_4: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
pp2.4:126.1_6: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
pp2.4:127.1_0: So iminā ca ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato iminā ca ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato iminā ca
pp2.4:127.1_1: ariyena satisampajaññena samannāgato imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati
pp2.4:127.1_2: araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
pp2.4:127.2_0: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
pp2.4:127.3_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodheti;
pp2.4:127.5_0: thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno,
pp2.4:127.6_0: uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto,
pp2.4:127.7_0: vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu,
pp2.4:128.1_0: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi
pp2.4:128.1_1: dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
pp2.4:128.2_0: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
pp2.4:128.3_0: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti,
pp2.4:128.3_1: yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti—“upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
pp2.4:128.4_0: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
pp2.4:129.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
pp2.4:129.3_0: ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo
pp2.4:129.3_1: tiṁsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi
pp2.4:129.4_0: “amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
pp2.4:129.5_0: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
pp2.4:129.6_0: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
pp2.4:130.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
pp2.4:130.2_0: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
pp2.4:130.4_0: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā.
pp2.4:130.5_0: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā
pp2.4:130.6_0: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā”ti.
pp2.4:130.7_0: So iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
pp2.4:131.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
pp2.4:131.4_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
pp2.4:131.6_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti pajānāti.
pp2.4:131.7_0: Evaṁ puggalo neva attantapo ca hoti na attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto,
pp2.4:131.8_0: So anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṁvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati.
pp2.4:132.2_0: Yassa puggalassa rāgo appahīno, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo “sarāgo”.
pp2.4:133.2_0: Yassa puggalassa doso appahīno, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo “sadoso”.
pp2.4:134.2_0: Yassa puggalassa moho appahīno, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo “samoho”.
pp2.4:135.2_0: Yassa puggalassa māno appahīno, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo “samāno”.
pp2.4:136.1_0: Kathañca puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya?
pp2.4:136.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ,
pp2.4:136.2_1: na lābhī lokuttaramaggassa vā phalassa vā.
pp2.4:136.3_0: Evaṁ puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
pp2.4:137.1_0: Kathañca puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya, na lābhī ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa?
pp2.4:137.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti lokuttaramaggassa vā phalassa vā,
pp2.4:137.2_1: na lābhī rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ.
pp2.4:137.3_0: Evaṁ puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya, na lābhī ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa.
pp2.4:138.1_0: Kathañca puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya?
pp2.4:138.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ,
pp2.4:138.3_0: Evaṁ puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
pp2.4:139.1_0: Kathañca puggalo neva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya?
pp2.4:139.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo neva lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṁ vā arūpasahagatānaṁ vā samāpattīnaṁ,
pp2.4:139.2_1: na lābhī lokuttaramaggassa vā phalassa vā.
pp2.4:139.3_0: Evaṁ puggalo neva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
pp2.4:140.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo kāme ca paṭisevati pāpañca kammaṁ karoti.
pp2.4:141.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo kāme ca na paṭisevati pāpañca kammaṁ na karoti.
pp2.4:141.3_0: So sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena assumukhenapi rudamāno paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carati.
pp2.4:142.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.4:143.1_0: Katamo ca puggalo tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo?
pp2.4:143.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
pp2.4:143.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati puggalo tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
pp2.4:144.1_0: Kathañca puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
pp2.4:144.2_0: Idhekaccassa puggalassa appakaṁ sutaṁ hoti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
pp2.4:144.3_0: So tassa appakassa sutassa na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
pp2.4:144.4_0: Evaṁ puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
pp2.4:145.1_0: Kathañca puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno?
pp2.4:145.2_0: Idhekaccassa puggalassa appakaṁ sutaṁ hoti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
pp2.4:145.3_0: So tassa appakassa sutassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
pp2.4:145.4_0: Evaṁ puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno.
pp2.4:146.1_0: Kathañca puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
pp2.4:146.2_0: Idhekaccassa puggalassa bahukaṁ sutaṁ hoti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
pp2.4:146.3_0: So tassa bahukassa sutassa na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
pp2.4:146.4_0: Evaṁ puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
pp2.4:147.1_0: Kathañca puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno?
pp2.4:147.2_0: Idhekaccassa puggalassa bahukaṁ sutaṁ hoti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthaṁ udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallaṁ.
pp2.4:147.3_0: So tassa bahukassa sutassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
pp2.4:147.4_0: Evaṁ puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno.
pp2.4:148.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano.
pp2.4:149.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti,
pp2.4:149.2_1: sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
pp2.4:150.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
pp2.4:151.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
